text: The 2010-11 Carleton Ravens represented Carleton University in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada during the 2010-11 CIS women's hockey season. The head coach is Shelley Coolidge. ==Exhibition== On March 26, the Ravens participated in the Shoot for the Stars charitye hockey game to raise funds for the Children's Wish Foundation. {| class="wikitable" style="width:80%;" |- style="text- align:center;
